backend/main.mo: Main actor defining user, business, customer, item, and invoice types with maps for per‑user storage, authorization mixins, GST filing status types, and initial state setup.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting OldInvoice records to NewInvoice by adding invoiceNumber and purchaseOrderNumber during canister upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for recent UI and workflow changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React components, pages, hooks, and PWA files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables, theme layers, dark mode values, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: PWA‑optimized HTML entry point with manifest links, icons, favicons, and extensive iOS splash‑screen declarations.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Defines PWA settings such as app name, theme, start URL, and icons for GST Pro.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching strategies for static assets and navigation with cache cleanup and fallbacks.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Manual smoke‑test checklist covering authentication, admin panel, and critical user flows for deployment verification.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry setting up React Query, routing, theming, error boundaries, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddUserDia: Dialog for admins to create a user with email, password, mobile, role, and optional access expiry.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCrede: Admin‑only login form using direct backend credentials with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyG: Gate component that loads admin status and either shows children, loading, or access‑denied UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPorta: Layout wrapper for admin pages with title header and optional back‑to‑admin button.
frontend/src/components/admin/SetAccessU: Dialog allowing admins to set or clear a user’s access expiry date with validation and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/UsersTable: Admin table listing all users with role badges, access info, delete and access‑expiry controls.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessGate.ts: No-op wrapper component that always renders children for Version 9 compatibility.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessLoginFo: Deprecated access form showing a notice that login is handled solely via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and PWA install section.
frontend/src/components/auth/CredentialS: Sign-in form handling email/password input, client-side validation, and credential sign-in mutation with error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignUpDialo: Sign‑up dialog with form validation, sign‑up mutation, success message flow, and automatic dialog closing.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles authentication flow using Internet Identity or credentials, showing login UI when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/customers/Custom: Dialog for adding or editing customers with form state management, validation, and submit mutations.
Table listing customers with edit/delete actions and a confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/components/ErrorFallbackScr: Displays an error message with options to reload or sign in after an application failure.
frontend/src/components/FirstAdminSetupD: Empty placeholder file for first admin setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/forms/Scrollable: Scrollable wrapper for select content ensuring consistent cross‑platform scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/gst/GstProfileSe: Displays GST profile details with status badges and structured profile rows based on filing status data.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Invoice: UI component to add, edit, and remove invoice line items with quantity, price, discount, and item selection.
Displays a badge indicating whether an invoice is Draft or Finalized.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Monthly: Computes and displays monthly aggregated invoice totals with GST breakdown and optional filtering.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing an item, including validation and save logic.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemsTable: Shows a table of items with edit and delete actions and handles empty and loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides sign-in and sign-out logic using Internet Identity with UI feedback and query cache management.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Responsive mobile navigation sheet with route links, active highlighting, and an external E‑Way Bill link.
frontend/src/components/PrintLayout.tsx: Minimal authenticated layout wrapper for print‑focused pages without standard app chrome.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new users for their name and saves the profile before allowing app use.
frontend/src/components/pwa/IosInstallHe: Dialog explaining step-by-step instructions to install the PWA on iOS.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallFo: Footer section offering Android and iOS PWA installation options with prompts and help dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCredentialSig: Provides an admin-only credential sign-in mutation that authenticates via the current actor and refreshes admin state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUserDashboard: Fetches user invoice KPIs and retrieves user details from the admin user list using actor-based admin queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUsers.ts: Supplies admin CRUD operations for users and lists all users, invalidating related queries after mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentialSignIn.t: Handles user credential login with automatic Internet Identity initialization and retries until an authenticated actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile, updating cached profile data when changed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and offering login and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks whether the current user is an admin using the actor, caching the result for short periods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrintOnce.ts: Triggers window.print a single time when ready and optionally runs a callback after printing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Detects PWA installability, manages beforeinstallprompt events, and exposes a function to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of actor-driven queries and mutations for user profiles, business profiles, customers, invoices, and related entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordInternetIden: Provides a hook that waits for an actor and logs Internet Identity sign-in events without blocking UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeInternetIdenti: Wraps Internet Identity login with logic to clear stale sessions and retry authentication safely.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignUp.ts: Defines a mutation hook that signs up new users via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables, safe-area rules, mobile touch behavior, and print styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page that prompts for admin credentials and displays admin tools when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserDashboardPag: Admin dashboard showing a selected user's details, sign-in state, and invoice KPIs.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Provides customer management with search, listing, and create/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard summarizing invoices, GST totals, and navigation shortcuts for key actions.
frontend/src/pages/GstFilingStatusPage.t: Provides a UI to search GSTINs, select periods and return types, fetch GST filing status, and display normalized status entries with badges.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays invoice details with totals, status, customer info, and actions for editing, finalizing, deleting, or printing the invoice.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceEditorPage.tsx: Handles creating and editing invoices, including line items, customer selection, invoice metadata, and form validation with save actions.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicePrintPage.tsx: Loads invoice, customer, item, and business data to render a print‑ready invoice layout and triggers automatic printing once ready.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicesPage.tsx: Lists invoices with filters for status, date, month, and year, and supports navigation to individual invoice pages.
frontend/src/pages/ItemsPage.tsx: Shows and filters items, handles add/edit via a dialog, and displays errors or loading states for item data.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React page for viewing and updating business profile settings, including logo upload with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates periodically, and logs update availability.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router route hierarchy for the app, including app, print, and admin layouts and pages.
frontend/src/utils/adminTimeFormat.ts: Converts backend bigint nanosecond timestamps to readable date or datetime strings and back.
frontend/src/utils/appAccessStorage.ts: Deprecated localStorage helpers for tracking app-access state per principal, kept for compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Utility functions for parsing, formatting, and extracting parts of invoice-related dates.
frontend/src/utils/financialYears.ts: Generates the last five Indian financial year strings based on the current date.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/gstCalculations.ts: Computes invoice totals including GST breakdown and provides related formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/gstFilingStatusDispla: Normalizes GST filing status text and maps it to displayable labels and badge variants.
frontend/src/utils/indianStates.ts: Exports a constant list of all Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceNumbering.ts: Generates invoice numbers using business profile settings and selects the appropriate displayed number.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceRules.ts: Provides rules for invoice deletion and corresponding error messages.
frontend/src/utils/passwordHash.ts: Empty placeholder file for password hashing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them for navigation persistence.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts various error types into user-friendly messages with cleanup and specific error-case handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the GST Pro project state, including versions, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features.
